its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to
pummel them with its fists.

name: tympole
description:
It uses sound waves to communicate with
others of its kind. People and other Pokémon
species can’t hear its cries of warning.

name: palpitoad
description:
On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to
the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their
bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.

name: seismitoad
description:
This Pokémon is popular among the elderly,
who say the vibrations of its lumps are great
for massages.

name: throh
description:
They train in groups of five. Any member that
can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave
the group.

name: sawk
description:
The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself
to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

name: sewaddle
description:
Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of
leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

name: swadloon
description:
It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in
leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves
in forests.

name: leavanny
description:
It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting
leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings
for Sewaddle.

name: venipede
description:
Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon
finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them
without any thought of how things might turn out.

name: whirlipede
description:
Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and
poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll
need for evolution.

name: scolipede
description:
Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with
Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles,
the victor makes a meal of the loser.

name: cottonee
description:
Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee
and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s
highly prized by many luxury brands.

name: whimsicott
description:
As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its
cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff
builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.

name: petilil
description:
The deeper the color of a Petilil’s leaves, the
healthier the Pokémon is. Petilil sometimes makes
its home in a well-tended field or flowerbed.

name: lilligant
description:
Essential oils made from Lilligant flowers
have a sublime scent, but they’re also
staggeringly expensive.

name: basculin-red-striped
description:
Known for their violence, these Pokémon
have the most fights with schools of red-
striped Basculin.

name: sandile
description:
Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are
powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile
moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.

name: krokorok
description:
Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that
allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move
much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.

name: krookodile
description:
While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has
the patience to stay hidden under sand for days,
lying in wait for prey.

name: darumaka
description:
This popular symbol of good fortune will never
fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed
or pulled.

name: darmanitan-standard
description:
When wounded, it stops moving. It goes as
still as stone to meditate, sharpening its mind
and spirit.

name: maractus
description:
Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds.
They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them
a precious food source out in the desert.

name: dwebble
description:
It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there
are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may
move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.

name: crustle
description:
Its thick claws are its greatest weapons.
They’re mighty enough to crack
Rhyperior’s carapace.

name: scraggy
description:
It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought
that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has
completely stretched out.

name: scrafty
description:
While mostly known for having the temperament
of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very
good care of its family, friends, and territory.

name: sigilyph
description:
A discovery was made in the desert where
Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been
an ancient city were found beneath the sands.

name: yamask
description:
The spirit of a person from a bygone age became
this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching
for someone who knows its face.

name: cofagrigus
description:
There are many depictions of Cofagrigus
decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols
of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.

name: tirtouga
description:
Its hunting grounds encompassed a broad area,
from the land to more than half a mile deep in
the ocean.

name: carracosta
description:
Carracosta eats every last bit of the prey it
catches, even the shells and bones, to further
strengthen its sturdy shell.

name: archen
description:
Restored from a fossil, this ancient bird
Pokémon has wings but can’t yet fly.

name: archeops
description:
Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, the
muscles it uses to flap its wings are still weak,
so it needs a long runway in order to take off.

name: trubbish
description:
This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with
trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched
by Trubbish.

name: garbodor
description:
The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm
is so virulent that it can kill a weakened
creature instantly.

name: zorua
description:
Zorua sometimes transforms into a person and
goes into cities to search for food. When Zorua
does this, it usually takes on the form of a child.

name: zoroark
description:
Seeking to ease the burden of their solitude,
lonely Trainers tell Zoroark to show illusions
to them.

name: minccino
description:
They pet each other with their tails as a form of
greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier
is a bit more boastful.

name: cinccino
description:
A special oil that seeps through their fur helps
them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price
at market.

name: gothita
description:
Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita
can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe
it’s speaking to something only it can see.

name: gothorita
description:
On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s
psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just
what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.

name: gothitelle
description:
A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle
went missing that same day and was never
seen again.

name: solosis
description:
Many say that the special liquid covering this
Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in
the vacuum of space.

name: duosion
description:
Its brain has split into two, and the two
halves rarely think alike. Its actions are
utterly unpredictable.

name: reuniclus
description:
It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding
Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is
highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.

name: ducklett
description:
They are better at swimming than flying, and they
happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they
dive underwater.

name: swanna
description:
Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in
the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: vanillite
description:
Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an
icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees
Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.

name: vanillish
description:
It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148
degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it
spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

name: vanilluxe
description:
People believe this Pokémon formed when two
Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is
roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: deerling
description:
The turning of the seasons changes the color and
scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark
the seasons.

name: sawsbuck
description:
They migrate according to the seasons, so some
people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

name: emolga
description:
This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries.
Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much
food that it can’t fly properly.

name: karrablast
description:
It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through
Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell—
it eats only the contents.

name: escavalier
description:
It charges its enemies, lances at the ready.
An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous
painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.

name: foongus
description:
The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands
are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried,
the spores can be used as stomach medicine.

name: amoonguss
description:
Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It
tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have
been dropped on the ground.

name: frillish
description:
Legend has it that the residents of a sunken
ancient city changed into these Pokémon.

name: jellicent
description:
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky,
schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of
the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.

name: alomomola
description:
The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened
condition is that any Pokémon coming after
them may also attack Alomomola.

name: joltik
description:
Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out
static electricity. They’re often found sticking to
Yamper’s hindquarters.

name: galvantula
description:
It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests
of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are
not yet good at flying.

name: ferroseed
description:
Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings.
Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s
spikes grow big and strong.

name: ferrothorn
description:
Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon
crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes
on its feelers into the stone.

name: klink
description:
It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration
behind ancient people’s invention of the
first gears.

name: klang
description:
Many companies in the Galar region choose
Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered
the symbol of industrial technology.

name: klinklang
description:
The three gears that compose this Pokémon
spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t
a living creature.

name: tynamo
description:
One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity,
so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful
electric shock.

name: eelektrik
description:
These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they
spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it
with electricity.

name: eelektross
description:
They crawl out of the ocean using their arms.
They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag
it into the ocean.

name: elgyem
description:
This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years
ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to
exert its psychic powers.

name: beheeyem
description:
Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields,
this Pokémon can control the memories of
its opponents.

name: litwick
description:
The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs,
the brighter and eerier the flame on its
head burns.

name: lampent
description:
It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp.
Once it finds someone whose death is near,
it will trail quietly after them.

name: chandelure
description:
In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of
lights, funerals were a constant occurrence—
or so it’s said.

name: axew
description:
They play with each other by knocking their large
tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but
they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.

name: fraxure
description:
Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s
favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents,
stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.

name: haxorus
description:
While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if
angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams
are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.

name: cubchoo
description:
It sniffles before performing a move, using its
frosty snot to provide an icy element to any
move that needs it.

name: beartic
description:
It swims energetically through frigid seas.
When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater
with its breath so it can rest on the ice.

name: cryogonal
description:
They are composed of ice crystals. They capture
prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at
-148 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: shelmet
description:
It has a strange physiology that responds to
electricity. When together with Karrablast,
Shelmet evolves for some reason.

name: accelgor
description:
Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep
itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in
bands of membrane.

name: stunfisk
description:
Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in
the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps
its jagged steel fins down on them.

name: mienfoo
description:
Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce.
Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly
will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.

name: mienshao
description:
Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this
Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into
tiny pieces.

name: druddigon
description:
Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up
residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon,
treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.

name: golett
description:
This Pokémon was created from clay. It received
orders from its master many thousands of years
ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.

name: golurk
description:
There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual
motion machine that produces limitless energy,
but this belief hasn’t been proven.

name: pawniard
description:
A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a
Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently,
dreaming of one day taking the lead.

name: bisharp
description:
Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and
Fraxure over places where sharpening stones
can be found.

name: bouffalant
description:
These Pokémon live in herds of about 20
individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will
lose the hair on their heads for some reason.

name: rufflet
description:
A combative Pokémon, it’s ready to pick a fight
with anyone. It has talons that can crush
hard berries.

name: braviary
description:
Because this Pokémon is hotheaded and
belligerent, it’s Corviknight that’s taken
the role of transportation in Galar.

name: vullaby
description:
Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too
small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed
down to younger ones in the nest.

name: mandibuzz
description:
They adorn themselves with bones. There seem
to be fashion trends among them, as different
bones come into and fall out of popularity.

name: heatmor
description:
A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the
hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour
their insides.

name: durant
description:
With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can
crunch their way through rock. They work
together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.

name: deino
description:
Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly
biting at everything it touches, trying to keep
track of its surroundings.

name: zweilous
description:
Their two heads will fight each other over a
single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in
scars even without battling others.

name: hydreigon
description:
The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into
the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their
target goes down.

name: larvesta
description:
Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire
from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators
and scare prey.

name: volcarona
description:
This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of
raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as
a deity of fire.

name: cobalion
description:
It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its
allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.

name: terrakion
description:
Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its
phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort
to protect Pokémon.

name: virizion
description:
Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents
with its swift movements.

name: tornadus-incarnate
description:
Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail,
causing severe storms. Its power is great enough
to blow houses away.

name: thundurus-incarnate
description:
As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over
the place and causes forest fires. It is
therefore disliked.

name: reshiram
zekrom
description:
Mythology tells us that if people lose the
righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms
will be razed by Zekrom’s lightning.

name: landorus-incarnate
description:
From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates
energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the
land abundant.

name: kyurem
description:
The sameness of Zekrom’s and Kyurem’s genes
allowed Kyurem to absorb Zekrom. Kyurem can
now use the power of both electricity and ice.

name: keldeo-ordinary
description:
When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it
becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast
to follow.

name: meloetta-aria
description:
Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization
method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.

name: genesect
description:
This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team
Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

name: chespin
description:
Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back
that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.

name: quilladin
description:
They strengthen their lower bodies by
running into one another. They are very
kind and won’t start fights.

name: chesnaught
description:
When it takes a defensive posture with its fists
guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

name: fennekin
description:
As it walks, it munches on a twig in place
of a snack. It intimidates opponents
by puffing hot air out of its ears.

name: braixen
description:
When the twig is plucked from its tail,
friction sets the twig alight. The flame
is used to send signals to its allies.

name: delphox
description:
Using psychic power, it generates a
fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit,
incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

name: froakie
description:
It protects its skin by covering its body in
delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air,
it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

name: frogadier
description:
Its swiftness is unparalleled.
It can scale a tower of more
than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.

name: greninja
description:
It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace.
It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while
slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

name: bunnelby
description:
It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of
Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby
digging a hole to hide underground in moments.

name: diggersby
description:
The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally
well. People used to make heavy winter clothing
from fur shed by this Pokémon.

name: fletchling
description:
When this Pokémon gets excited, its body
temperature increases sharply. If you touch a
Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.

name: fletchinder
description:
Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and
aggressive. These Pokémon fight among
themselves over feeding grounds.

name: talonflame
description:
Talonflame dives toward prey at speeds of up to
310 mph and assaults them with powerful kicks,
giving the prey no chance to escape.

name: scatterbug
description:
The powder that covers its body
regulates its temperature, so it
can live in any region or climate.

name: spewpa
description:
The beaks of bird Pokémon can’t begin
to scratch its stalwart body.
To defend itself, it spews powder.

name: vivillon
description:
The patterns on this Pokémon’s wings
depend on the climate and topography
of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

name: litleo
description:
This hot-blooded Pokémon is filled with
curiosity. When it gets angry or starts
fighting, its short mane gets hot.

name: pyroar
description:
The temperature of its breath is over 10,000
degrees Fahrenheit, but Pyroar doesn’t use it on
its prey. This Pokémon prefers to eat raw meat.

name: flabebe
description:
Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it’s
collected from its flower. The crown has hidden
healing properties.

name: floette
description:
It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its
heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives
anyone who messes up a flower bed.

name: florges
description:
Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said
to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.

name: skiddo
description:
If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t
need to eat, because it can generate
energy from the leaves on its back.

name: gogoat
description:
They inhabit mountainous regions.
The leader of the herd is decided by
a battle of clashing horns.

name: pancham
description:
Wanting to make sure it’s taken seriously,
Pancham’s always giving others a glare.
But if it’s not focusing, it ends up smiling.

name: pangoro
description:
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of
its opponents. It strikes with punches that can
turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.

name: furfrou
description:
Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer,
but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.

name: espurr
description:
There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a
wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be
controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.

name: meowstic-male
description:
The defensive instinct of the males is strong.
It’s when they’re protecting themselves or their
partners that they unleash their full power.

name: honedge
description:
The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the
true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it
drains people’s lives away.

name: doublade
description:
The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly
alternating between offense and defense to
bring down their prey.

name: aegislash-shield
description:
Once upon a time, a king with an Aegislash
reigned over the land. His Pokémon eventually
drained him of life, and his kingdom fell with him.

name: spritzee
description:
The scent its body gives off enraptures those
who smell it. Noble ladies had no shortage of
love for Spritzee.

name: aromatisse
description:
The scents Aromatisse can produce range from
sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells
that sap an opponent’s will to fight.

name: swirlix
description:
The sweet smell of cotton candy perfumes
Swirlix’s fluffy fur. This Pokémon spits out
sticky string to tangle up its enemies.

name: slurpuff
description:
Slurpuff’s fur contains a lot of air, making it soft
to the touch and lighter than it looks.

name: inkay
description:
By exposing foes to the blinking of its
luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them,
and then it seizes the chance to flee.

name: malamar
description:
It’s said that Malamar’s hypnotic powers played
a role in certain history-changing events.

name: binacle
description:
If the two don’t work well together, both their
offense and defense fall apart. Without good
teamwork, they won’t survive.

name: barbaracle
description:
Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep
watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start
to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.

name: skrelp
description:
Skrelp looks like a piece of rotten seaweed, so it
can blend in with seaweed drifting on the ocean
and avoid being detected by enemies.

name: dragalge
description:
Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking
the plume on its head out above the ocean’s
surface and bathing it in sunlight.

name: clauncher
description:
By detonating gas that accumulates in its right
claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet.
This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.

name: clawitzer
description:
Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches
projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a
Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.

name: helioptile
description:
The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity
generation. Interruption of that process
stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.

name: heliolisk
description:
One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill
outspread is all it would take to produce enough
electricity to power a city.

name: tyrunt
description:
Tyrunt is spoiled and selfish. It may just be
trying to frolic, but sometimes the ones it’s
trying to frolic with are gravely injured.

name: tyrantrum
description:
Complete restoration is impossible, allowing
room for theories that its entire body was
once covered in a feather-like coat.

name: amaura
description:
Amaura was restored successfully, but it’s not
expected to live long because of the heat of the
current environment.

name: aurorus
description:
This usually quiet and kindly Pokémon has a
surface temperature of around
–240 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: sylveon
description:
There’s a Galarian fairy tale that describes
a beautiful Sylveon vanquishing a dreadful
dragon Pokémon.

name: hawlucha
description:
It always strikes a pose before going for its
finishing move. Sometimes opponents take
advantage of that time to counterattack.

name: dedenne
description:
Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on
its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other
electric Pokémon.

name: carbink
description:
To keep the jewels on their bodies free of
tarnish, packs of Carbink use their soft manes
to polish one another’s jewels.

name: goomy
description:
Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as
Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into
hiding. This is how they’ve survived.

name: sliggoo
description:
The lump on its back contains its tiny brain.
It thinks only of food and escaping its enemies.

name: goodra
description:
Its form of offense is forcefully stretching out its
horns. The strikes land 100 times harder than any
blow from a heavyweight boxer.

name: klefki
description:
Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping
its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so
much that its head needed to look like one, too.

name: phantump
description:
With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.

name: trevenant
description:
Small roots that extend from the tips of this
Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the
forest and give Trevenant control over them.

name: pumpkaboo-average
description:
The light that streams out from the holes in the
pumpkin can hypnotize and control the people
and Pokémon that see it.

name: gourgeist-average
description:
In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist
will come knocking. Whoever answers the door
will be swept off to the afterlife.

name: bergmite
description:
This Pokémon lives in areas of frigid cold.
It secures itself to the back of an Avalugg
by freezing its feet in place.

name: avalugg
description:
As Avalugg moves about during the day,
the cracks in its body deepen. The Pokémon’s
body returns to a pristine state overnight.

name: noibat
description:
No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s
ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it
generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.

name: noivern
description:
Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies
with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone.
Its fangs finish the fight.

name: xerneas
description:
When the horns on its head shine
in seven colors, it is said to be
sharing everlasting life.

name: yveltal
description:
When its life comes to an end, it absorbs
the life energy of every living thing
and turns into a cocoon once more.

name: zygarde
description:
Some say it can change to an even more
powerful form when battling those who threaten
the ecosystem.

name: diancie
description:
It can instantly create many diamonds
by compressing the carbon in the air
between its hands.

name: hoopa
description:
It is said to be able to seize anything it desires
with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power
sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.

name: volcanion
description:
It expels its internal steam from the
arms on its back. It has enough
power to blow away a mountain.

name: rowlet
description:
During the day, it builds up energy via
photosynthesis. At night, it flies silently
through the sky, on the prowl for prey.

name: dartrix
description:
It never slacks when it comes to the task of
cleaning its feathers. Thorough preening keeps it
looking spiffy and its blade quills nice and sharp.

name: decidueye
description:
In a tenth of a second, it can nock and fire an
arrow quill, piercing an opponent’s weak point
before they notice what’s happening.

name: litten
description:
Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will
result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws.
Be careful.

name: torracat
description:
When facing a powerful enemy, Torracat’s
fighting spirit gets pumped up, and its fire bell
blazes hotter.

name: incineroar
description:
Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its
most notable trait, but the way it helps out small
Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.

name: popplio
description:
If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons,
they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for
these Pokémon to develop their skills.

name: brionne
description:
On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance
with one another to the singing of the Primarina
that’s leading them.

name: primarina
description:
For Primarina, every battle’s a stage. Its singing
and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize
the audience.

name: pikipek
description:
It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are
heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times
per second!

name: trumbeak
description:
From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries
it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise
to new plants.

name: toucannon
description:
Known for forming harmonious couples, this
Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a
good luck charm.

name: yungoos
description:
Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh
living things, so it marches down streets
in search of prey.

name: gumshoos
description:
Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of
itself and pounces when it spots its favorite
meal—Rattata!

name: grubbin
description:
It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest
floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.

name: charjabug
description:
Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats
into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores
the electricity for later use.

name: vikavolt
description:
If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery,
a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered
beams of electricity.

name: crabrawler
description:
Crabrawler has been known to mistake
Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The
enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.

name: crabominable
description:
Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling.
There are records of its turning back
avalanches with a flurry of punches.

name: oricorio-baile
description:
This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer
gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon
becomes fiercely angry.

name: cutiefly
description:
An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that
opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can
glide around the attack and strike back.

name: ribombee
description:
Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or
rained on. In the cloudy Galar region,
they are very seldom seen.

name: rockruff
description:
This Pokémon intimidates opponents by striking
the ground with the rocks on its neck. The
moment an opponent flinches, Rockruff attacks.

name: lycanroc-midday
description:
With swift movements, this Pokémon gradually
backs its prey into a corner. Lycanroc’s fangs are
always aimed toward opponents’ weak spots.

name: wishiwashi-solo
description:
When it senses danger, its eyes tear up.
The sparkle of its tears signals other
Wishiwashi to gather.

name: mareanie
description:
Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie
of the Galar region have not yet figured out
that the branches of Corsola are delicious.

name: toxapex
description:
Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so
toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still
be suffering three days after it first takes effect.

name: mudbray
description:
It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all
over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk
on rough terrain without slipping.

name: mudsdale
description:
Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry
over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest
or sleep.

name: dewpider
description:
Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it
comes onto land in search of food, it takes
water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.

name: araquanid
description:
It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them
inside its bubble and letting them eat any
leftover food.

name: fomantis
description:
During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and
sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around
at night.

name: lurantis
description:
The petals on this Pokémon’s arms are thin and
super sharp, and they can fire laser beams if
Lurantis gathers light first.

name: morelull
description:
Morelull live in forests that stay dark even
during the day. They scatter flickering spores
that put enemies to sleep.

name: shiinotic
description:
If you see a light deep in a forest at night,
don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall
fast asleep.

name: salandit
description:
This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey
and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the
prey even realizes Salandit is there.

name: salazzle
description:
The winner of competitions between Salazzle
is decided by which one has the most male
Salandit with it.

name: stufful
description:
The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may
be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is
flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.

name: bewear
description:
The moves it uses to take down its prey would
make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued
prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.

name: bounsweet
description:
When under attack, it secretes a sweet
and delicious sweat. The scent only calls
more enemies to it.

name: steenee
description:
Any Corvisquire that pecks at this
Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from
its sepals followed by a sharp kick.

name: tsareena
description:
A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s
legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and
soul that will never heal.

name: comfey
description:
These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear
different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has
its own individual scent.

name: oranguru
description:
It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes
across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will
gather medicinal herbs to treat it.

name: passimian
description:
Passimian live in groups of about 20, with
each member performing an assigned role.
Through cooperation, the group survives.

name: wimpod
description:
Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the
lookout for danger. They scatter the moment
they detect an enemy’s presence.

name: golisopod
description:
They live in sunken ships or in holes in the
seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct
battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.

name: sandygast
description:
Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes
control of anyone who puts their hand into its
mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.

name: palossand
description:
This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates
water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like
shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.

name: pyukumuku
description:
It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist,
allowing it to stay on land for days without
drying up.

name: type-null
description:
It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth.
The mask placed upon it limits its power in order
to keep it under control.

name: silvally
description:
The final factor needed to release this
Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond
with a Trainer it trusts.

name: minior-red-meteor
description:
Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable,
the shock of falling to the ground smashes the
shell to smithereens.

name: komala
description:
It remains asleep from birth to death as a result
of the sedative properties of the leaves that
form its diet.

name: turtonator
description:
Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes
explosive compounds to develop in its shell.
Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.

name: togedemaru
description:
When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes
its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges
electricity indiscriminately.

name: mimikyu-disguised
description:
There was a scientist who peeked under
Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research.
The scientist died of a mysterious disease.

name: bruxish
description:
Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s
spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches
up the spikes and eats them.

name: drampa
description:
Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until
it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a
gale and flattens everything around.

name: dhelmise
description:
After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It
catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.

name: jangmo-o
description:
Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with
others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s
become as hard as metal.

name: hakamo-o
description:
Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its
scales together and roars. Its sharp claws
shred the opposition.

name: kommo-o
description:
Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors
wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.

name: tapu-koko
description:
The lightning-wielding guardian deity of
Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity
and appears before people from time to time.

name: tapu-lele
description:
Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is
devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and
can be described as nature incarnate.

name: tapu-bulu
description:
It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others
know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts.
This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.

name: tapu-fini
description:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible
calamities sometimes befall those who
recklessly approach Tapu Fini.

name: cosmog
description:
Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious,
often placing itself in danger. If things start to
look dicey, it teleports away.

name: cosmoem
description:
It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate,
frantically building up energy within its core as
preparation for evolution.

name: solgaleo
description:
Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That
Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light
radiates boundlessly from it.

name: lunala
description:
It steals the light from its surroundings and then
becomes the full moon, showering its own light
across the night sky.

name: nihilego
description:
It appeared in this world from an Ultra
Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite
that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.

name: buzzwole
description:
Buzzwole goes around showing off its
abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind
of Ultra Beast.

name: pheromosa
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: xurkitree
description:
They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of
them stand unmoving, like trees, with their
arms and legs stuck into the ground.

name: celesteela
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: kartana
description:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

name: guzzlord
description:
An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be
constantly hungry—it is certainly always
devouring something.

name: necrozma
description:
When Necrozma latches on to Lunala, it becomes
vicious, seeing enemies everywhere it looks.
It will burn the world with lasers.

name: magearna
description:
Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist,
the part called the Soul-Heart is the
actual life-form.

name: marshadow
description:
This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow,
so it went undiscovered for a long time.

name: poipole
description:
An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it
cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with
poison from the needles on its head.

name: naganadel
description:
One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing,
venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid
is also immensely adhesive.

name: stakataka
description:
When stone walls started moving and attacking,
the brute’s true identity was this mysterious
life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

name: blacephalon
description:
A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it
causes explosions, then takes advantage of
opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.

name: zeraora
description:
Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs.
Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and
thunder echoes.

name: meltan
description:
They live as a group, but when the time comes,
one strong Meltan will absorb all the others
and evolve.

name: melmetal
description:
It can send electric beams streaking out from the
hole in its belly. The beams’ tremendous energy
can vaporize an opponent in one shot.

name: grookey
description:
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.
As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets
more and more pumped.

name: thwackey
description:
When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it
gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even
notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.

name: rillaboom
description:
The one with the best drumming techniques
becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle
disposition and values harmony among its group.

name: scorbunny
description:
It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and
one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these
pads radiate tremendous heat.

name: raboot
description:
It kicks berries right off the branches of trees
and then juggles them with its feet, practicing
its footwork.

name: cinderace
description:
It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it
gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts
showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

name: sobble
description:
When it gets wet, its skin changes color,
and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if
it were camouflaged.

name: drizzile
description:
Highly intelligent but also very lazy,
it keeps enemies out of its territory
by laying traps everywhere.

name: inteleon
description:
Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’
weak points so it can precisely blast them with
water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

name: skwovet
description:
It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made
it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on
farms, searching for yet more berries.

name: greedent
description:
Common throughout the Galar region, this
Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew
through the toughest of berry shells.

name: rookidee
description:
Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied
Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest
opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

name: corvisquire
description:
The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it
how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.

name: corviknight
description:
With their great intellect and flying skills, these
Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar
region’s airborne taxi service.

name: blipbug
description:
Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs
on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

name: dottler
description:
As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic
abilities to monitor the outside world and
prepare for evolution.

name: orbeetle
description:
It emits psychic energy to observe and study
what’s around it—and what’s around it can
include things over six miles away.

name: nickit
description:
Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by
stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with
swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

name: thievul
description:
With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes
around stealing food and eggs. Boltund
is its natural enemy.

name: gossifleur
description:
It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous
song. This delightful display has charmed many
into raising this Pokémon.

name: eldegoss
description:
The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be
spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar
regional specialty.

name: wooloo
description:
If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be
able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this
Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

name: dubwool
description:
Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the
opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

name: chewtle
description:
It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard
horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this
Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

name: drednaw
description:
This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck
to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and
take them down.

name: yamper
description:
This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with
their work because it wants treats. As it runs,
it crackles with electricity.

name: boltund
description:
It sends electricity through its legs to boost their
strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks
50 mph.

name: rolycoly
description:
It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough,
rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

name: carkol
description:
By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over
18 mph. The temperature of the flames it
breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: coalossal
description:
While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal
will burn bright red, sending off sparks that
scorch the surrounding area.

name: applin
description:
As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not
only does the apple serve as its food source, but
the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.

name: flapple
description:
It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a
powerful acid. It can also change its shape
into that of an apple.

name: appletun
description:
Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the
skin on its back is especially yummy. Children
used to have it as a snack.

name: silicobra
description:
It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy
is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

name: sandaconda
description:
Sand swirls around its body with such speed and
power that it could pulverize a skyscraper.

name: cramorant
description:
This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole.
Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to
swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

name: arrokuda
description:
After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become
extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant
swallows it up.

name: barraskewda
description:
It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging
forward at speeds of over 100 knots before
ramming prey and spearing into them.

name: toxel
description:
It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison
to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it
can cause a tingling paralysis.

name: toxtricity-amped
description:
This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon
chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it
might contain.

name: sizzlipede
description:
It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking
them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will
voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

name: centiskorch
description:
While its burning body is already dangerous on
its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has
large and very sharp fangs.

name: clobbopus
description:
Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed
when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back.
It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.

name: grapploct
description:
Searching for an opponent to test its skills
against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle
is over, it returns to the sea.

name: sinistea
description:
The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its
home is a famous piece of antique tableware.
Many forgeries are in circulation.

name: polteageist
description:
When angered, it launches tea from its body
at the offender’s mouth. The tea causes
strong chills if swallowed.

name: hatenna
description:
If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it
will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas
without people.

name: hattrem
description:
Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to
get them to quiet down. One blow from those
braids would knock out a professional boxer.

name: hatterene
description:
If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn
apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon
is also known as the Forest Witch.

name: impidimp
description:
It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things
and feasting on the negative energy of the
frustrated occupants.

name: morgrem
description:
With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the
woods. Some believe it to have the power to
make crops grow.

name: grimmsnarl
description:
Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs
unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring
them as tentacles would.

name: obstagoon
description:
It evolved after experiencing numerous fights.
While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that
would make any opponent flinch.

name: perrserker
description:
After many battles, it evolved dangerous
claws that come together to form daggers
when extended.

name: cursola
description:
Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body
surrounding its soul. You’ll become
stiff as stone if you touch it.

name: sirfetchd
description:
After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield,
it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek
stalk is both weapon and food.

name: mr-rime
description:
Its amusing movements make it very popular.
It releases its psychic power from the pattern
on its belly.

name: runerigus
description:
Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be
shown the horrific memories behind the picture
carved into it.

name: milcery
description:
This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling
particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

name: alcremie
description:
When Alcremie is content, the cream it
secretes from its hands becomes sweeter
and richer.

name: falinks
description:
The six of them work together as one Pokémon.
Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they
constantly change their formation as they fight.

name: pincurchin
description:
It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets
broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for
at least three hours.

name: snom
description:
It eats snow that piles up on the ground.
The more snow it eats, the bigger and more
impressive the spikes on its back grow.

name: frosmoth
description:
It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields
and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings,
causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

name: stonjourner
description:
Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific
time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in
a circle.

name: eiscue-ice
description:
This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool
with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single
hair into the sea to lure in prey.

name: indeedee-male
description:
Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions
of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the
source of its strength.

name: morpeko
description:
It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if
they’re precious treasures. No matter how much
it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

name: cufant
description:
If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon
will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the
rain, turning a vibrant green color.

name: copperajah
description:
These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have
incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush
giant rocks into powder.

name: dracozolt
description:
The powerful muscles in its tail generate its
electricity. Compared to its lower body,
its upper half is entirely too small.

name: arctozolt
description:
This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and
was able to preserve food with the ice on its
body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

name: dracovish
description:
Its mighty legs are capable of running at
speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon
can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.

name: arctovish
description:
The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but
breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go
extinct anyway.

name: duraludon
description:
The special metal that composes its body is very
light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility.
It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

name: dreepy
description:
If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child
could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help
it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

name: drakloak
description:
Without a Dreepy to place on its head and
care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute
any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

name: dragapult
description:
Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s
horns eagerly look forward to being launched out
at Mach speeds.

name: zacian-hero
description:
This Pokémon has slumbered for many years.
Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others
say the two Pokémon are rivals.

name: zamazenta-hero
description:
This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of
a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot
that it ever existed.

name: eternatus
description:
It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years
ago. There seems to be a connection between
this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.

name: kubfu
description:
If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head,
its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up
from the depths of its belly.

name: urshifu-single-strike
description:
This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in
defeating foes by raining many blows down on
them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.

name: zarude
description:
This Zarude’s special strength stems from its love
and care for an orphaned human child that the
Pokémon has raised since the child’s infancy.

name: regieleki
description: Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable of creating all Galar's electricity.

name: regidrago
description: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.

name: glastrier
description: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.

name: spectrier
description: As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.

name: calyrex
description: Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
